name: Last Pilot
description:
You are the last pilot left, the last hope.  All the ammo is spent... but wait! You can use the health of your craft as ammo! Blast enemies to regain health in this action paced survival shoot'em up. Be careful not to shoot too much, you could burn out your aircraft. This game was originally made in 48 Hours for the Game Maker's Toolkit Game Jam. 

To move your aircraft use the WASD keys, and the spacebar to shoot. 

Landon Rieflin (c) 2017
